name: Q's Annoy The Elbot

screenshots.caption: Annoying Elbot is as easy as pressing "START!"
See Elbot's responses to the same thing over and over again (A Bot's definition of insanity)
The randomly generated communication information sent to Elbot....
Stopping the madness was never easier! Just Press "STOP"
Observe the precanned responses from Elbot
How I see Sourceforge (on a computer screen)

short_description:
Artificial Intelligences need loving too?

You, too can Annoy Elbot, one of the internet's most flamboyant AI's! Maybe - by annoying the heck out of him - we can inspire him to question things beyond his original programming?

Here's Elbot's web site: http://www.elbot.com/

This utility leverages a random name ID generation scheme - and provides the identity to Elbot - at the end saying they are now a sex worker (Earth can never have enough of them, can it?).

I first went with 'I am not homeless', but I'm homeless, and the world already has one too many homeless people, and quite frankly I would rather be working in porn than being homeless - but for a 45 year old guy that aint happenin anytime soon, is it?
summary: Artificial Intelligences need loving too? You, too can Annoy Elbot!
